name: Homemade Tetris
description:
It's a recreation of Tetris. Like all my other projects, it was made to see if I could even do it; most of the effort was spent on coding, though I hope the rest of the game doesn't look too half-assed.

Credits to Idreesinc for creating Monospace, a font which I used for most of the text in this project. https://github.com/IdreesInc/Monocraft
